text: Waldenberg Messias Coelho (born 27 January 1989 in Maceió, Alagoas, Brazil), commonly known as Berg, is a Brazilian professional footballer who is currently a free agent. He is a versatile attacker and can play as an Attacking Midfielder."巴西中場貝治加盟 理文流浪添進攻火力"; Lee Man Rangers, 11 January 2017 == References == ==External links== * *Thefinalball profile Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Association football midfielders Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Hong Kong Rangers FC players Category:Hong Kong Premier League players Category:Expatriate footballers in Hong Kong Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Hong Kong
title: Waldenberg Messias Coelho
